text:
The 18th College Day celebrations of Kumararani Meena Muthiah College of Arts and Science, Gandhi Nagar, Adyar, was held recently. The chief guest was Kiruba Shankar, an entrepreneur, and author. Dr. Meena Muthiah, secretary, and correspondent, of the College, welcomed the gathering.

Dr. P.T. Vijayshree, principal, read out the College annual report.
title: College Day
